pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h2",null,{"id":"gem","children":"gem"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"使用以下命令替换 gems 默认源"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"# 添加镜像源并移除默认源
gem sources --add {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ --remove https://rubygems.org/
# 列出已有源
gem sources -l
# 应该只有镜像源一个","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["或者，编辑 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"~/.gemrc"}],"，将"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["加到 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"sources"}]," 字段。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"bundler","children":"bundler"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"使用以下命令替换 bundler 默认源"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"bundle config mirror.https://rubygems.org {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["官方文档：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"http://bundler.io/v1.16/man/bundle-config.1.html#MIRRORS-OF-GEM-SOURCES","rel":"nofollow","children":"http://bundler.io/v1.16/man/bundle-config.1.html#MIRRORS-OF-GEM-SOURCES"}]]}]]}]

meta.title: Ruby Gems 镜像使用帮助
